title: Minecraft Hoe Guns Plugin
shortDescription: Turning Minecraft's harmless hoe items into shooting snowballs and fireballs!
description: A Java-based Minecraft plugin implementing a new PVP system to the game! The boring hoes? They are now weapons that throw snowballs, fireballs, arrows at various speeds depending on their level and type.
reason: After deciding on building a Minecraft server and writing some plugins for management, I needed a minigame. And this plugin was the core mechanic of that minigame.
